product_name: Seattle Sports Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield Case
long_description: The Seattle Sports Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield case offers 2 cases in 1. Use them separately or combine them for protection from shock and moisture. Outer neoprene case features a belt loop, D-ring attachment and rip-and-stick top flap; it fits most smart phones and digital cameras. Inner polyethylene vinyl acetate case is waterproof and is sized to fit most smart phones and compact point-and-shoot digital cameras.
short_description: The Seattle Sports Dry Doc Digi Doubleshield case offers 2 cases in 1. Use them separately or combine them for protection from shock and moisture.
